Detailed Description

Class containing a route ID.

Copy constructor and operator= should work.

bool RouteID::operator< (  const RouteID &  other  )  const [inline]
 

Returns true if this is less than other.

Creation time is first which is good if putting them into a map when you want to remove the oldest.
